attributes.action: Install street charging points for electric bikes.
attributes.additional_details: There are different methods of charging, so to avoid the need to carry the weighty chargers with the E-bike and only carry an adaptor/lead.  The system would need to cater for these different methods.  The system I use would only need a socket for two bullet connectors plus a balance lead socket at the charger connection, where others would need  special adaptors which would need to be carried. The charger would need a cell type switch and a voltage switch for different charging voltages.
attributes.background: There are a growing number of E-bikes in the UK.  At the moment we need to charge them at home before going on a journey.  There is interest for longer journeys where the E-bike could be charged along the way.
